Hey guys does anyone know if it’s possible to set a different width and offset of dnd columns for mobile vs default breakpoints?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/responsive-breakpoints#defining-responsive-styles-in-code-dnd-area-code-tags-with-hubl|In the documentation> it says that it’s possible to define a “mobile” format for any styling tag on a `dnd_column`. However, I can only make this work for padding and margin, when what i really need are width and offset
For now it only works with styling and not layout.
